title: Alcatel A3 10 3 GB RAM 32 GB ROM 10.1 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (White, Blue)

product_specification.Additional Features: FM Radio, 21 Languages Support, Dual Speaker
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Charger, USB Data Cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: HD LED Backlit Display with IPS Technology
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Immersive Sound: Can't go a day without listening to music or watching videos? Then this tablet is what you need. The Alcatel A3 10 is the perfect entertainment companion as it comes with dual speakers which offer an outstanding sound wave effect while the Arkamys system provides an immersive sound.
product_description.Beautiful Design: Its 3D texturized back cover adds a touch of elegance to the Alcatel A3 10 while its slim 8.95 mm design feels great in your hands.
product_description.Brilliant Performance: There's more to this tablet than just good looks and sleek design. The Alcatel A3 10 is powered by a 1.1 GHz quad-core processor and 3 GB of RAM, which means you can multitask easily and switch between apps without facing lag. What's more, this tablet also offers blazing-fast 4G connectivity and a glitch-free streaming experience.
product_description.Split Screen for Easy Multitasking: Do you hate it when you have to pause your game just to reply to a text message? Well, with the Alcatel A3 10, you don't have to as it comes with a split screen feature. This Alcatel tablet runs on the Android Nougat OS which offers easy user experience.
product_description.Stunning Display: The 25.4 cm IPS display of this tablet makes way for an immersive video experience. Watch movies on the go and catch up on your favourite TV shows in an excellent clarity. That's not all, this tablet also comes with 32 GB internal storage which can further be expanded by up to 128 GB.
product_description.Battery: Thanks to this 4600 mAh Lithium Polymer battery, you can go all-day long listening to music and watching movies without worrying about running out of charge.
product_description.Camera: Equipped with a 8 MP rear camera and a 5 MP front camera, this tablet allows you to capture everyday moments and video call your loved ones. Media files are saved in its 32 GB ROM.

Seriously telling i was very excited for this device, but sadly it just can't match my expectations. I am going to try as many relevant points i can to help you guys make a decision.

First let's talk about Pros:
1. Talking over the build quality and display, the device is great.
2. Ample of storage space for this mid range category that hardly any other tablet provides.
3. Big screen experience in this price range is just too good to be true, which is very useful for official works, web surfing and reading novels. Screen is bright and easy to eyes while using indoors.

Apart from this i didn't find any silver lining in this one. That makes us to look for cons:
1. Camera is a huge disappointment, both rear and front camera are clearly below average.
2. Performance of mediatek is below satisfactory. It is that bad that the tab actually starts lagging from the first day if you try to watch videos from youtube.
3. There are two speaker grills but the sound is not good at all. It feels like the sound is muffled and will ruin your music experience.
4. Battery drains pretty quick and charging is very slow (thanx to the 5v,1amp charger). However, this can give a backup of about a day on normal usage.
5. Not a con but i feel that there should be a direct usb port which was there in some of the tablets of the past.

So, on & on this one is good for official purposes and if you eyeing to purchase it for reading novels and watching offline movies. Anything above this will surely not give you a pleasant experience.!

pros.25.4 cm IPS display: The tablet has a 25.4 cm IPS display which is big and gives an immersive viewing experience.
pros.4600 mAh Battery: The 4600 mAh battery of this tablet is amazing and gives long backup of almost a day on normal use.
pros.Sound: The stereo speakers of this tablet gives really good sound quality.

cons.Camera: The 8MP primary camera and 5MP secondary camera is of average quality and is not suitable for photography purposes.
cons.Performance: The Mediatek Quad Core Processor is not good enough and is very slow in response.

summary.verdict: The Alcatel A3 10 is a decent purchase in this price range and gives some really good features which exceeds expectations.
